name: plaTonic (itch) (Maybe Mythos)
description:
plaTonic is a visual novel exploring platonic bonds and aromanticism.  Play as a witch running a potion shop on the edge of the Faerie Circle, home to the mysterious fae. The witch may have met all kinds of beings in their shop, but they’ve never met anyone quite like the peculiar stranger who turns up on their doorstep late one night. 

✦ 𝖎𝖓𝖋𝖔 ✦

Currently plaTonic is in early development and is available as a demo. It has been created over the course of September by MaybeMythos for the Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam. However, when completed it is going to be nonlinear with branching choices. Currently, available choices mainly effect how your character falls on the limited aromantic spectrum we had time to showcase.
